bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Medical Device Communications
Physical Layer Interface
Cable Connected
IEEE Standard for Medical Device Communications - Physical Layer Interface - Cable Connected

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A physical interface for the interconnection of computers and medical devices in the IEEE 1073 family of standards is defined. This interface is intended to be highly robust in an environment where devices are frequently connected to and disconnected from the network. The physical and electrical characteristics of the connector and signals necessary to exchange digital information between cable-connected, medical devices and host computer systems are specified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
